channel.title: Help with amulet of glory and some other questions | will REP ++!:)
channel.description:
First off, I'm running 317 DELTA Edge4Pk Source.
[b]How do I add teleports to the Amulet of Glory? Like "Rub" Amulet Of Glory brings up another screen in chat box with teleport selections.[/b]
[b]How do I make it so when you click a casket, it opens and another item is replaced in the players inventory. [/b]
If someone could help me out, I'll rep ++

item.title: Help with amulet of glory and some other questions | will REP ++!:)
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

First off, I’m running 317 DELTA Edge4Pk Source.

How do I add teleports to the Amulet of Glory? Like “Rub” Amulet Of Glory brings up another screen in chat box with teleport selections.

How do I make it so when you click a casket, it opens and another item is replaced in the players inventory.

If someone could help me out, I’ll rep ++

Read full topic
